name: BDFM
text:
Delays  Posted: 07/08/2018  2:44PM

Southbound [A] [C] and [D] trains are running with delays because of track maintenance between 125 St and 59 St-Columbus Circle.

Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 7, Saturday, 6:45 AM to 11:45 PM • Jul 8, Sunday, 8:30 AM to 10 PM
Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a Middle Village-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Marcy Av or Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
STATION IMPROVEMENTS | 10:45 PM Fri, Jul 6 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
Manhattan-bound [F] trains run via the [N] from Stillwell Av to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr in Brooklyn


Take the [D] instead, making [F] stops from Stillwell Av to Jay St-MetroTech.
• Transfer between [D] and [F] trains via passageway at 42 St-Port Authority/Times Sq.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT | 9:45 PM Fri, Jul 6 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
Coney Island-bound [F] trains skip Sutphin Blvd, Briarwood and 75 Av in Queens


For service to Sutphin Blvd, take the [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service to Briarwood and 75 Av, take the [F] to Union Tpke or 71 Av
and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] or Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from Sutphin Blvd and Briarwood, take the [F] to Parsons Blvd
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

For service from 75 Av, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [F].




Planned Work
SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS | 9:30 PM Fri, Jul 6 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
[F] Service is rerouted in Manhattan and Brooklyn

[A] [C] [D] [N] [R] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service

No [F] service at 57 St, 47-50 Sts, 42 St-Bryant Pk, 23 St, 14 St, W 4 St, B'way-Lafayette St, 2 Av, Delancey St, East Broadway, and York St.

[F] service operates between Jamaica-179 St and Lexington Av-63 St and via the [Q] express to/from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr (skipping DeKalb Av, days and evenings) and via the [D] to Stillwell Av.
After 10:45 PM, Manhattan-bound [F] trains operate via the [N] from Stillwell Av to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

[D] trains are rerouted via the [A] in Manhattan and replace the [F] in Brooklyn between Jay St-MetroTech and Stillwell Av.

[SB] Buses operate along two routes:
1. Between W 4 St and East Broadway, stopping at B'way-Lafayette St, 2 Av and Delancey St-Essex St.
2. Between Jay St-MetroTech and York St.

Show Shuttle Bus Stops

Station Bus Stop
W 4 St [ad] [A] [C] [D] [E] 6 Av at W 3 St
B'way-Lafayette St Houston St at Lafayette St (to East Broadway)
Houston St at Broadway (to W 4 St)
2 AvHouston St at 1 Av
Delancey St/Essex St [J] Delancey St at Essex St (to East Broadway)
Essex St at Delancey St (to W 4 St)
East BroadwayEssex St at Straus Square
York StJay St at York St
Jay St-MetroTech [ad] [A] [C] [D] [N] [R]Jay St at Willoughby St


In Manhattan, use nearby [N] [Q] [R] stations along Broadway, [1] [2] [3] stations along 7 AV,
the [J] and [SB] buses for stations on the Lower East Side.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.






Planned Work
STATION IMPROVEMENTS | 10:45 PM Fri, Jul 6 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
No Manhattan-bound [D] service from Stillwell Av to 36 St in Brooklyn


No Manhattan-bound [D] service at Bay 50 St, 25 Av, Bay Pkwy, 20, 18 Avs, 79, 71, 62, 55, 50 Sts, Fort Hamilton Pkwy and 9 Av.

[D] trains are rerouted via the [F] in both directions between Stillwell Av and Jay St-MetroTech.

Coney Island-bound [F] trains make [D] stops from 36 St to Stillwell Av in Brooklyn.
Manhattan-bound [F] trains run via the [N] from Stillwell Av to 36 St in Brooklyn.

For service to these [D] stations, take the [F] or [N] to 36 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

For service from these [D] stations, take the [F] to Stillwell Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [D] [F] or [Q].

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS | 9:30 PM Fri, Jul 6 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
[D] Service is rerouted between 59 St-Columbus Circle, Manhattan and Stillwell Av, Brooklyn

[1] [2] [3] [F] [N] [Q] [R] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service

No [D] service at 7 Av, 47-50 Sts, 42 St-Bryant Pk, 34 St-Herald Sq, B'way-Lafayette St and Grand St.

No Manhattan-bound [D] service from Stillwell Av to 36 St in Brooklyn. (Please see separate [D] advisory)

[D] service operates between Norwood-205 St and 59 St-Columbus Circle and via the [A] express to/from Jay St-MetroTech and via the [F] to/from Stillwell Av.

[F] trains are rerouted via the [Q] express in Manhattan and replace the [D] in Brooklyn between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and 36 St. Coney Island-bound [F] trains make [D] stops from 36 St to Stillwell Av.

[SB] Buses operate between W 4 St and Grand St, stopping at B'way-Lafayette St.

In Manhattan, use nearby [N] [Q] [R] stations along Broadway, [1] [2] [3] stations along 7 Av, [A] [C] stations or [SB] buses.

For Brooklyn, take the [F] instead.

Transfer via passageway at 42 St-Port Authority/Times sq [1] [2] [3] [N] [Q] [R] and [F] trains on [Q] platform.

Transfer between [D] trains and [SB] buses at W 4 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | 4 PM Sun, Jul 8 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
Norwood-bound [D] trains skip 170 St, 174-175 Sts and 182-183 Sts in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [D] to Tremont Av or Fordham Rd and transfer to
a Coney Island-bound [D].

For service from these stations, take the [D] to Tremont Av or 167 St and transfer to
a Norwood-bound [D].
